councilSection.heading: Medical and Administrative Academic Council
councilSection.description: The Academic and Administrative Council is represented by the presence of all the major departments within the school. The council consists of department heads who meet weekly in scheduled meetings on a fixed day, time, and location. These meetings are one of the primary tools that contribute to guiding academic and administrative matters within the school.
